description.raw:
`ConfigWidget` offers a lot of functionality to uniformly style widgets and set/get values from them. However, currently the only way to create such a widget is by parsing messages. This pull request exposes a basic API to allow creating custom `ConfigWidget`s with all the styling and functionality but without the need for messages. This will be used in the new Model Editor joint creation tool.

* Made all `Create*` functions public (and moved them up, thus the big diff)

* Added functions `CreateGroupWidget`, `AddConfigChildWidget` and `ConfigChildWidgetCount`

* Added a test where a custom config widget is created.

  • Made all Create* functions public (and moved them up, thus the big diff)

  • Added functions CreateGroupWidget, AddConfigChildWidget and ConfigChildWidgetCount

  • Added a test where a custom config widget is created.

title.raw: Make it possible to create custom ConfigWidgets
